attributes.action: We call for an alliance of Left-of-Centre parties for the General Election.
attributes.background:
We urge Labour, the Liberal Democrats, the Greens and the SNP to set aside their differences and create a progressive coalition that can defeat this Tory government. We face a future of further cuts, privatisation and the death of our NHS. 

Unity is our only hope of winning this election.

rejection.details: This petition is calling on political parties, not the Government or Parliament, to take action.
